Headline: #155 Devon Temporary Reroute at Devon/Hoyne
ShortDescription: 155 Devon buses are rerouted in both directions via Devon, Ridge, Pratt, Western and Devon, over normal route, due to street blockage near Devon/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Devon, Ridge, Pratt, Western and Devon, over normal route, due to street blockage near Devon/Hoyne.

Allow extra travel time.
